attributes.action: stop spending ludicrous amounts of our money on unnecessary sports facilities, and give the Olympics back to Athens, where they belong -- permanently.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Returning the Olympics permanently to Athens would put an end to the corrupt travelling circus of the IoC, taking publicly funded bribes all over the world, and in particular would prevent Britain having to pay unknown costs and interest charges (like Montreal) into the indefinite future.
